mixture.name: Folet DHA
mixture.ingredients: Ascorbic acid + Beta carotene + Cholecalciferol + Cyanocobalamin + D-alpha-Tocopherol acetate + Doconexent + Docusate + Ferrous bisglycinate + Folic acid + Magnesium oxide + Nicotinamide + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Selenium + Thiamine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: BumP DHA
mixture.ingredients: Cobamamide + Flavin adenine dinucleotide + Flavin mononucleotide + Iron + Leucovorin + Levomefolic acid + Magnesium oxide + NADH + Omega-3 fatty acids + Potassium Iodide + Pyridoxal phosphate + Pyridoxine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: vitaMedMD Rx Plus
mixture.ingredients: 5-methyltetrahydrofolic acid + Ascorbic acid + Biotin + Calcium carbonate + Cholecalciferol + Copper + Cyanocobalamin + DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate + Doconexent + Ferrous bisglycinate + Folic acid + Nicotinamide + Pantothenic acid + Potassium Iodide + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Thiamine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: Prena1 Plus
mixture.ingredients: 5-methyltetrahydrofolic acid + Ascorbic acid + Biotin + Calcium carbonate + Cholecalciferol + Copper + Cyanocobalamin + DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate + Doconexent + Ferrous bisglycinate + Folic acid + Nicotinamide + Pantothenic acid + Potassium Iodide + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Thiamine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: BumP DHA
mixture.ingredients: Cobamamide + Flavin adenine dinucleotide + Flavin mononucleotide + Iron + Leucovorin + Levomefolic acid + Magnesium oxide + NADH + Omega-3 fatty acids + Potassium Iodide + Pyridoxal phosphate + Pyridoxine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: FeRiva 21 7
mixture.ingredients: Ascorbic acid + Cyanocobalamin + Ferrous asparto glycinate + Folic acid + Succinic acid + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: Nicomide
mixture.ingredients: Chromium + Cupric oxide + Folic acid + Nicotinamide + Selenium + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: Corvite FE
mixture.ingredients: Calcium ascorbate + Calcium threonate + Cholecalciferol + Cyanocobalamin + Ferrous asparto glycinate + Folic acid + Iron + Magnesium malate + Pyridoxine + Zinc glycinate

mixture.name: Corvite FE
mixture.ingredients: 5-methyltetrahydrofolic acid + Calcium ascorbate + Calcium threonate + Cholecalciferol + Cyanocobalamin + Folic acid + Iron + Magnesium malate + Pyridoxine + Zinc glycinate

drug-interaction.name: Ursodeoxycholic acid
drug-interaction.description: Zinc glycinate can cause a decrease in the absorption of Ursodeoxycholic acid resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.
